channel.title: CiTR -- Sports Broadcast Archive
channel.description: CiTR 101.9 FM provides the most comprehensive amateur sports coverage of any campus/community radio station in Canada. As the radio home of UBC Athletics, CiTR broadcasts Thunderbirds football, basketball, hockey and volleyball throughout the fall, winter, and spring.
channel.itunes:summary: CiTR 101.9 FM provides the most comprehensive amateur sports coverage of any campus/community radio station in Canada. As the radio home of UBC Athletics, CiTR broadcasts Thunderbirds football, basketball, hockey and volleyball throughout the fall, winter, and spring.
channel.itunes:author: CiTR 101.9 Vancouver
channel.itunes:subtitle: CiTR -- Sports Broadcast Archive
